transform.tRule: # Malayalam-InterIndic #:: NFD (NFC) ; ം→\uE002; # SIGN ANUSVARA ഃ→\uE003; # SIGN VISARGA അ→\uE005; # LETTER A ആ→\uE006; # LETTER AA ഇ→\uE007; # LETTER I ഈ→\uE008; # LETTER II ഉ→\uE009; # LETTER DA ധ→\uE027; # LETTER DHA ന→\uE028; # LETTER NA ഩ→\uE029; # LETTER NNNA പ→\uE02A; # LETTER PA ഫ→\uE02B; # LETTER PHA ബ→\uE02C; # LETTER BA ഭ→\uE02D; # LETTER BHA മ→\uE02E; # LETTER MA യ→\uE02F; # LETTER YA ര→\uE030; # LETTER RA റ→\uE031; # LETTER RRA ല→\uE032; # LETTER LA ള→\uE033; # LETTER LLA ഴ→\uE034; # LETTER LLLA വ→\uE035; # LETTER VA ശ→\uE036; # LETTER SHA ഷ→\uE037; # LETTER SSA സ→\uE038; # LETTER SA ഹ→\uE039; # LETTER HA ഺ→\uE024; # LETTER TTTA, remapped to LETTER TA ഻→\uE04D; # SIGN VERTICAL BAR VIRAMA, remapped to SIGN VIRAMA ഼→\uE04D; # SIGN CIRCULAR VIRAMA, remapped to SIGN VIRAMA ഽ→\uE03D; # SIGN AVAGRAHA ാ→\uE03E; # VOWEL SIGN AA ി→\uE03F; # VOWEL SIGN I ീ→\uE040; # VOWEL SIGN II ു→\uE041; # VOWEL SIGN U ൂ→\uE042; # VOWEL SIGN UU ൃ→\uE043; # VOWEL SIGN VOCALIC R ൄ→\uE044; # VOWEL SIGN VOCALIC RR ൊ→\uE04A; # VOWEL SIGN O, decomposed ോ→\uE04B; # VOWEL SIGN OO, decomposed ൌ→\uE04C; # VOWEL SIGN AU (archaic form), decomposed െ→\uE046; # VOWEL SIGN E േ→\uE047; # VOWEL SIGN EE ൈ→\uE048; # VOWEL SIGN AI ൊ→\uE04A; # VOWEL SIGN O ോ→\uE04B; # VOWEL SIGN OO ൌ→\uE04C; # VOWEL SIGN AU (archaic form) ്→\uE04D; # SIGN VIRAMA ൎ→\uE030\uE04D; # LETTER DOT REPH, remapped to RA VIRAMA ൔ→\uE02E\uE04D; # LETTER CHILLU M, remapped to MA VIRAMA ൕ→\uE02F\uE04D; # LETTER CHILLU Y, remapped to YA VIRAMA ൖ→\uE034\uE04D; # LETTER CHILLU LLL, remapped to LLLA VIRAMA ൗ→\uE04C; # AU LENGTH MARK, remapped to VOWEL SIGN AU ൟ→\uE008; # LETTER ARCHAIC II, remapped to LETTER II ൠ→\uE060; # LETTER VOCALIC RR ൡ→\uE061; # LETTER VOCALIC LL ൢ→\uE062; # VOWEL SIGN VOCALIC L ൣ→\uE063; # VOWEL SIGN VOCALIC LL ൦→\uE066; # DIGIT ZERO ൧→\uE067; # DIGIT ONE ൨→\uE068; # DIGIT TWO ൩→\uE069; # DIGIT THREE ൪→\uE06A; # DIGIT FOUR ൫→\uE06B; # DIGIT FIVE ൬→\uE06C; # DIGIT SIX ൭→\uE06D; # DIGIT SEVEN ൮→\uE06E; # DIGIT EIGHT ൯→\uE06F; # DIGIT NINE ൰→\uE067\uE066; # UNMAPPED Malayalam-InterIndic: NUMBER TEN ൱→\uE067\uE066\uE066;
